usefulItems: cutting board, large bowl, non-stick, ovenproof frying pan (approx. 9 in.-10 in.), oven
title: Red Pepper Spanish 'Tortilla' with Olive Tapenade

ingredients.content: 7 oz new potatoes, peeled, halved, sliced (approx. ¼ in.)

preparations.content: Place black olives, green olives, capers, sun-dried tomatoes, basil, paprika and balsamic vinegar into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and chop a further <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Clean mixing bowl.
Place Parmesan into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Clean mixing bowl.

Place onion, garlic, parsley and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>2 min/250°F/speed 1<b>. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside.

Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, weigh in potatoes, red peppers and mushrooms, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Remove Varoma and transfer steamed vegetables to bowl with the onion mixture. Discard steaming water.
Place eggs, milk,  paprika, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>, then transfer to bowl with other ingredients and stir to combine with spatula.
Grease a non-stick, ovenproof frying pan with olive oil and place over medium heat. Transfer mixture from bowl into the frying pan and ensure vegetables are evenly spread out.
Evenly sprinkle reserved Parmesan cheese, then reduce heat to low and cook for 6-8 minutes or until the eggs are set on the bottom of the tortilla yet still slightly runny on top.
Remove frying pan from stove top and bake for 6 minutes (400°F) or until eggs on top of tortilla are just set and starting to turn golden.
Remove from oven and allow tortilla to rest in frying pan for 2-3 minutes. Carefully remove tortilla from frying pan with spatula onto a cutting board.
Cut tortilla into 8 wedges and serve immediately with reserved Olive Tapenade on the side.
